backend/main.mo: Main canister handling user approval, roles, access requests, and profile management with admin authorization checks.
backend/user-name.mo: Defines a simple UserName type containing a name field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI layout update to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color tokens, theming variables, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component choosing between login, pending approval, or main app views based on identity and approval state.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard that restricts access to admin-only pages and redirects non-admin users.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessStatus.ts: Hook fetching approval and admin status using backend calls with refetch behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the authenticated backend actor and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, approvals, and roles through the backend actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessPendingScreen.t: UI for submitting and tracking access approval requests, with localStorage persistence and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin interface displaying pending approvals and user roles with actions to approve, reject, assign roles, and manage users.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Main authenticated home screen showing modules, profile setup flow, announcements, and admin navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/modules/FrieslandFung: Placeholder module page with basic layout and navigation back to the home screen.
frontend/src/pages/modules/LandVanOns.ts: React page component showing a styled placeholder module screen for Land van Ons with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/modules/Pottle.tsx: React page component displaying a placeholder module screen for Pottle with consistent styling and a back button.
frontend/src/router/AppRouter.tsx: Defines the application's route tree using TanStack Router, including home, module pages, and an admin route wrapped with an AdminGuard.
frontend/src/utils/masterAdmin.ts: Empty utility file reserved for master admin functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state describing a mobile UI fix request focused on improving button alignment in the Approved Users section.
